topic.title: VALUE ADDED TAX CHARGED INDICATOR (CONTRACT MONITORING)
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether Value Added Tax was included in the price of a PRESCRIBED ITEM or MEDICAL DEVICE for Contract Monitoring.
